description: Mechanical engineering major from Lexington, Kentucky. Fall '13 AM class, BK 1964. Love Georgia Tech and Kentucky Basketball is my religion. I play soccer and enjoy the outdoors.
aspects: My favorite part about Lambda Chi is being part of a close knit brotherhood of individuals who all have something different to offer. Everyone in this fraternity is unique and its why we are one of the most diverse on campus. The relationships and opportunities that come from this are special and not something you can find anywhere else. Lambda Chi will allow me to strive for my goals and grow into the person that I want to become.
name: Connor Lakofka
